block.l: if (!proc.requestedImage) { // Create new request proc.requestedImage = new Image(); proc.requestedImage.crossOrigin = 'Anonymous'; proc.requestedImage.src = url; proc.requestedImage.onerror = function(event) { proc.requestedImage.error = event; }; } else if (proc.requestedImage.complete && proc.requestedImage.naturalWidth) { // Clear request image = proc.requestedImage; proc.requestedImage = null; return new Costume(image, 'image'); } else if (proc.requestedImage.error) { if (proc.requestedImage.fatal) { proc.requestedImage = null; throw Error('Could not retrieve image'); } proc.requestedImage = null; proc.requestedImage = new Image(); proc.requestedImage.crossOrigin = 'Anonymous'; proc.requestedImage.src = 'https://crossorigin.me/' + url proc.requestedImage.fatal = true; } proc.pushContext('doYield'); proc.pushContext();
